bibl.title: Letter from Edward P. Wallace to Howard A. Kelly, June 28, 1907

div1.p: Wallace sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Edward P. Wallace to Howard A. Kelly, June 28, 1907
div1.opener:
ans
ack. check
Amesbury, Mass., June 28-1907
Mr Howard A. Kelly
Baltimore, Maryland
Dear Sir-
div1.p:
Enclosed find Money
Order for $1- for John R.
Kissinger, I wish it were
more, and no matter whether
his present disability has any
connection with the yellow-fever
musquito bite or not -- he was obed-
ient to a noble impulse and deser-
ves well of his countrymen.
div1.closer:
Truly Yours Edward P. Wallace #29 Whitehall st
Amesbury. Mass.
